sentences.sentence: Pertaining to the ossicles in the middle ear.
Changes of the eardrum, ossicles, facial nerve path and antral plate are also observed.
sentences.translation: 同时分析中耳腔、听骨链、面神经通道、鼓窦盖等变化。

sentences.sentence: To study morphologic changes of ear ossicles and auditory ossicular chain of patients with conductive deafness.
sentences.translation: 明确传导性耳聋的听小骨及听骨链的形态学改变。
